statements: SELECT * FROM Billing_Insurance;
SELECT patient_name, billing_amount FROM Billing_Insurance WHERE insurance_company = 'Company A';
SELECT patient_name, insurance_company, billing_amount FROM Billing_Insurance ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Billing_Insurance;
SELECT SUM(billing_amount) AS total_billing FROM Billing_Insurance WHERE insurance_company = 'Company B';
SELECT * FROM Billing_Insurance WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_company FROM Billing_Insurance WHERE insurance_company = 'XYZ Insurance' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM Billing_Insurance WHERE billing_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, insurance_company, billing_amount FROM Billing_Insurance WHERE patient_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_company FROM Billing_Insurance WHERE billing_amount < 5000 ORDER BY insurance_company ASC, billing_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation;
SELECT patient_id, billing_id, amount_due FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY date_billed DESC;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(amount_due) AS total_amount_due FROM BillingInformation GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT insurance_id, patient_id, policy_number, provider FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE provider LIKE '%Blue%';
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation WHERE amount_due > 1000 ORDER BY date_billed DESC
SELECT patient_id, SUM(amount_due) AS total_due FROM BillingInformation GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_due > 5000
SELECT billing_id, amount_due FROM BillingInformation WHERE date_billed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM InsuranceInformation ORDER BY policy_number ASC
SELECT patient_id, provider, SUM(coverage_amount) AS total_coverage FROM InsuranceInformation GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_coverage >= 50000
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT bill_id, bill_amount FROM billing_info WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT insurer_name, policy_type FROM insurance_info WHERE coverage_amount < 5000 ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reimbursement_info WHERE reimbursement_amount > 500 AND reimbursement_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, bill_amount, bill_date FROM billing_info WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE bill_amount > 1000 ORDER BY bill_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT insurer_name, coverage_amount FROM insurance_info WHERE policy_type = 'Health' ORDER BY insurer_name ASC;

SELECT billing_info.bill_id, bill_amount, reimbursement_amount FROM billing_info JOIN reimbursement_info ON billing_info.bill_id = reimbursement_info.bill_id WHERE bill_amount > reimbursement_amount ORDER BY reimbursement_amount DESC, bill_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE bill_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 OR patient_id = 12345;

SELECT billing_info.bill_id, bill_amount, reimbursement_amount, reimbursement_date FROM billing_info JOIN reimbursement_info ON billing_info.bill_id = reimbursement_info.bill_id WHERE bill_date >= '2021-01-01' AND reimbursement_amount > 0 ORDER BY bill_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation;
SELECT patient_id, amount, service_date FROM BillingInformation WHERE provider_id = 123;
SELECT insurance_provider, coverage_amount FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE patient_id = 456 ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT report_date, total_paid, balance_due FROM FinancialReporting WHERE patient_id = 789 AND total_billed > total_paid;
SELECT reimbursement_amount, reimbursement_date, status FROM Reimbursement ORDER BY reimbursement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation ORDER BY billing_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, provider_id, service_code FROM BillingInformation WHERE provider_id = 12345 AND amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE coverage_amount >= 5000 AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, total_billed, total_paid, balance_due FROM FinancialReporting WHERE total_billed > total_paid;
SELECT * FROM Reimbursement WHERE reimbursement_amount < 0 AND status = 'Rejected';
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patient_info ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM billing_info ORDER BY bill_date;
SELECT patient_name, total_bill_amount, total_payment_amount FROM financial_report WHERE total_payment_amount > total_bill_amount;
SELECT * FROM billing_info ORDER BY bill_date DESC, bill_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Male' OR dob BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT insurance_company, policy_number FROM insurance_info WHERE LENGTH(policy_number) > 10 ORDER BY insurance_company ASC;
SELECT patient_id, report_date, total_bill_amount FROM financial_report WHERE total_payment_amount < total_bill_amount ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT reimbursement_id, patient_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM reimbursement WHERE reimbursement_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
